stories.title: Birdie Sanders
stories.content: Bernie Sanders is a Disney Princess. The birds have spoken! A vote for Bernie is a vote for Snow White.
stories.author: Bri

stories.title: Season 3 of Daredevil confirmed!
stories.content: After another sucessful season, Netflix has decided to place an order for another 13 episode season. It is not set to begin filming until 2017.
stories.author: Bri
